name: Amarya
tag_list: e-commerce, organic-beauty-products, organic-skin-care, beauty-products, skin-care, retail, etail, beauty-webcasts
overview:
Amarya sells organic beauty products in the UK both online and from retail premises in Knutsford, Cheshire.

Amarya supports this activity with weekly webcasts showing new products and treatments as well as a blog. Furthermore, Amarya uses Facebook and Twitter to keep their customers informed about new developments and promotions.
